user_input:
Modify the DHEM model.

• Get the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level (use crud pipeline)
• Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level by setting all values that aren't 0 to 999. Copy the H2\Gas.
• Add a scenario called unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities
• Add a max flow property to each object in the H2 interconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories in the gas pipeline class, with the datafile and scenario created in the previous step
• Clone the model "DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995" and add the new scenario. Call the model “DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline”
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the PLEXOS model modification requirements.

tasks.description: Retrieve the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file at the PCIPMI infrastructure level using the crud pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Select the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file attribute at the PCIPMI level based on the provided model details.

tasks.description: Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level by copying the H2\Gas file and setting all non-zero values to 999.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Identify the H2\Gas file and apply the modifications as per user input to create the new data file variation.

tasks.description: Add a new scenario object called 'unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities' to the model using the crud pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Select the appropriate location in the model to add the new scenario object based on PCIPMI infrastructure requirements.

tasks.description: For each object in the H2 interconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories in the gas pipeline class, add a 'max flow' property that references the new datafile and scenario.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Identify objects in the specified categories and update their properties to include the 'max flow' attribute with the relevant references.

tasks.description: Clone the model 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995' to create a new model called 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline' using the clone_transfer_pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Select the original model based on the provided identifier and clone it to the new model name.

tasks.description: Add the new scenario 'unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities' to the cloned model to ensure it includes the required scenario.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Insert the scenario object into the cloned model in the appropriate location.
